name: whatson-api
description: What's on? API to retrieve movies and tv shows

scripts.push: bash data/checkIds.sh check_dataset movie && bash data/checkIds.sh check_dataset tvshow && npm run prettier && npm run test && git add . && git cz && git push origin main && git push bitbucket main && git push bitbucket_2 main && git push bitbucket_3 main
scripts.update-movie-data-first-half: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(true));" | xargs -I {} node src/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db no_local no_active no_check {} no_check_data force mojo check_services no_delete 7
scripts.update-movie-data-second-half: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(false));" | xargs -I {} node src/updateData.js movie no_update_ids update_db no_local no_active no_check {} no_check_data force mojo check_services no_delete 7
scripts.update-tvshow-data-all: node -e "const { getDateValue } = require('./src/utils/getDateValue'); console.log(getDateValue(true));" | xargs -I {} node src/updateData.js tvshow no_update_ids update_db no_local no_active no_check {} no_check_data force mojo check_services no_delete 7
